lines.text: Do you want to talk about the brief?
Everyone I have told about the brief is dead.
I take my chances.
[first lines]
Any of those signs got my name on 'em?
Quite a few.
What do they say?
Death to Rosenberg, Retire Rosenberg, Cut off the oxygen.
Rosenberg equals the government over business, the individual over government, the environment over everything. And the Indians? Oh, give 'em whatever they want.
Well with all due respects sir, that wasn't my line, that was a quote.

From one of your unnamed senior White House officials; senior White House son of a bitch I should have said, who got in there by stirring up these people, one against the other. It never fails to amaze me what a man will do to get into the Oval Office.
[last lines]
Where is Darby Shaw?
I think that's also a question for Darby Shaw, but I know that she's not available to answer questions as long as this "feed frenzy" continues.
Does that mean that you don't know where she is?
No I didn't say that.
Then you do know...
[laughs]
I, I take it this cryptic smile means you'll not answer...
[smirking uncontrollably]

Okay Gray, you know that in view of all this, you know that there's a lot of speculation that this woman is a figment of your imagination. That you created her, from a lot of different sources. Just as there are people who believe there was no Deep Throat, there are those who believe that there is no Darby Shaw. In other words, she's just too good to be true.
She almost is.
You know, when you came in... I thought I was hallucinating again.
I'm sorry.
Oh, no, I'll take a hallucination like that, anytime.
How'd you find me?
I called the paper and asked for your address.
And?
I told them I was your sister Mary in from out of town and couldn't find you.

[looks surprised]
How'd you know I had a sister Mary?
You're not the only one who does research.
So you're the little lady who started this great brouhaha.
Darby Shaw, you take my breath away.
Didn't they also say they knew of no connection with the assassination?
Yes. But what else are they gonna say?

[Gray is watching Darby on the stairs as he walks in]
Mr. Grantham?

[Quickly looks down]
Great architecture.
She sounds almost too good to be true

[pause]
She almost is
I've decided my agenda for the future. I'll stay in bed, drink, make love and forget the whole damn business.
